rows.label: qst700805_msg0001
rows.name:
Kachakacha been found out?
Is OK, will come quietly.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0002
rows.name:
Can boil Kachakacha in pot,
roast on skewer... Kachakacha
not complain.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0101
rows.name: We'd never do anything like that!

rows.label: qst700805_msg0102
rows.name:
We just want you to apologize for what
you did. You can do that, can't you?

rows.label: qst700805_msg0201
rows.name:
So you're willing to accept whatever
punishment we dish out, are you?

rows.label: qst700805_msg0202
rows.name:
Good man. After your repentance,
I'll personally see to it that your
safety is assured!

rows.label: qst700805_msg0301
rows.name:
Your cooperative behavior will reflect
favorably upon you.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0302
rows.name:
But your fate is not for us to decide.
It is the old lady who must pass
judgement.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0401
rows.name:
That makes things easy for us.
You're going straight to Ofa and you're
going to apologize to her.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0501
rows.name: I'm glad that you are being cooperative.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0502
rows.name:
Now, you're to head over to the old
lady. I'll expect a sincere apology
from you!

rows.label: qst700805_msg0601
rows.name: You've got guts, for a Nopon.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0602
rows.name:
If you're so repentant, why don't
you just go and apologize to the
old lady and be done with it?

rows.label: qst700805_msg0701
rows.name: We're not here to arrest you.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0702
rows.name:
We just want you to have a word
with the old woman.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0801
rows.name:
Are you quite sure about that?
I doubt you'll even be recognizable
when I'm finished with you.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0802
rows.name:
Haha, I jest. Come, the lady awaits
an apology.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0901
rows.name:
We are no acting authority, and as
such, have no right to judge you.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0902
rows.name:
But nevertheless, we must insist that
you smooth things over with the lady
whom you've troubled.
